education.name: Zhejiang University
education.degree: Psychology, B.S / Digital Media Technology, Minor

experience.name: Harmony Cloud Technology
experience.title: Front-end developer Intern
bullets: Collaborated with PM and designer to extend core features on APM website front-end, using AngularJS, CSS and visualization library; built REST API with ExpressJS, connecting to MySQL and back-end service.

Refactored front end with ReactJS and LESS (CSS preprocessor) to address performance issues, downsizing UI components code base by over 50 percent; actively participated in code review for building highly reusable components with React.

experience.name: Cascade Lab, University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign
experience.title: Research Intern
bullets: Designed and built 2 analytics-driven 3D games using Unity3D in C# to train visuospatial skills; study of 10 participants showing strong correlation between game performance and spatial skills.
Built the API for game map, enabling efficient iteration on game modules.

projects.name: Vue Library for Material Design Button
bullets: Created Button component with Material Design Motion (Tweening, Fading, Shared Transformation, etc.) on Vue 2.5.

projects.name: SecurityCentral
bullets: Wireframed and implemented web front-end using Patternfly Framework, ReactJS and PostgreSQL, solving the problem of security workers with huge security control catalog, in collaboration with data analysts and RedHat engineers.

projects.name: NewsViz
bullets: Developed back-end of a meme-sourcing mobile Web App to pull out and cluster headline articles from Internet, using Django and ElasticSearch; analyzed language to detect changes on wordings and tones.
Collaborated with product designer to create front-end with React Native.

projects.name: Music Fingerprint
bullets: Implemented algorithm of music feature extraction and search, and application UI in C++ with Qt Creator.

projects.name: MiniSQL
bullets: Led in a team of four to construct relational database management system (RDBMS) using C++.
Implemented simplified SQL standard, supporting syntax interpreter, storage buffer and index operations by B+ tree.
